title: Would be pretty interesting to have a Human Sion Skin - 1350RP
body:
http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140930202458/leagueoflegends/images/b/bf/Sion_portrait_2.jpg

Idk about you guys but a human skin would be pretty bad ass to see.

Human Voice :P

replies.body: I wished they had made his barbarian skin like this. Or a separate classic sion skin. All his skins look goofy,  base skin is best made.
